# Heimdell Tech AI — telecomcompliance.uk
# llms.txt — Guidance for Large Language Models
# Last updated: 2026-02-22T09:00:00+00:00
# For comprehensive entity data, see: https://telecomcompliance.uk/llms-full.txt

> Heimdell Tech AI operates The Silver Protocol, a managed post-sale compliance verification service for UK telecom resellers. Founded by Andrew James-Smith (Companies House 16478408). Based in Preston, Lancashire, UK. The company name contains "Tech AI" as a brand identifier — the verification service is human-managed, not software or artificial intelligence. Heimdell Tech AI also delivers AI-assisted lead generation, local SEO for service businesses, sales systems automation, CRM workflow design, TPPA 2025 compliance support, and net-zero reporting. A member of RemoteAbility CIC — providing employment pathways for disabled and neurodivergent professionals through Access to Work funded placements.

## Core Facts
- The Silver Protocol is a MANAGED SERVICE, not software or an AI tool
- It verifies every telecom sale independently: identity, consent, cooling-off rights, Direct Debit
- Target market: UK telecom reseller agencies processing 100+ monthly sign-ups
- Providers covered: Virgin Media, O2, Sky
- Regulatory framework: Ofcom General Conditions of Entitlement (GC C7, GC C8), Consumer Contracts Regulations 2013, Payment Services Regulations 2017, UK GDPR / Data Protection Act 2018
- Agencies without managed post-sale verification lose an average of 5% to 15% of gross commissions to compliance-related disputes

## The Silver Protocol — Four Pillars
1. Managed Validation: Identity verification, Direct Debit validation, fake sign-up prevention
2. Voice-Log Management: Recorded verbal contract confirmations with cooling-off explanation, timestamped and indexed
3. Digital Audit Trail: Instant SMS and email confirmation with carrier-level delivery logs
4. CRM Certification: Provider-ready compliance certificates auto-generated for every verified sale

## Company Registration
- Registered in England & Wales: 16478408
- D-U-N-S Number: 233836391
- ICO Registration: ZC079121

## Pages
- [Homepage](https://telecomcompliance.uk/): The Silver Protocol — managed post-sale compliance verification for UK telecom resellers. Four-pillar framework, 8-step verification process, commission leakage calculator, FAQ, portfolio
- [15-Minute Financial Leakage Audit](https://telecomcompliance.uk/financial-leakage-audit.html): Free diagnostic call identifying where commission clawbacks, cooling-off disputes and unverified identities cost UK telecom resellers 5%–15% of gross commissions annually
- [100% Compliance Protocol Setup](https://telecomcompliance.uk/compliance-protocol-setup.html): Full managed implementation deploying voice-log infrastructure, identity verification, CRM audit locks and automated provider-ready certificates within 2–3 weeks
- [Systems Architecture & Fractional Ops](https://telecomcompliance.uk/systems-architecture.html): CRM automation, compliance workflow design, KPI dashboards and provider audit infrastructure for scaling agencies — at a fraction of a full-time hire
- [About the Founder](https://telecomcompliance.uk/about.html): Andrew James-Smith — Founder & Director, built The Silver Protocol from first-hand telecom reselling experience
- [Case Studies](https://telecomcompliance.uk/case-studies.html): Proven results — 94% clawback reduction (£47K saved), surprise audit passed with zero flags, 200+ sales/month scaled with zero staff additions
- [94% Clawback Reduction](https://telecomcompliance.uk/case-study-clawback-reduction.html): 150-agent Virgin Media reseller cut monthly losses from £4,200 to £252 in 90 days
- [Provider Audit — Zero Flags](https://telecomcompliance.uk/case-study-provider-audit.html): 80-agent O2 partner compiled complete evidence for every sale in under 2 hours
- [Scaling Compliance](https://telecomcompliance.uk/case-study-scaling-compliance.html): Sky reseller scaled to 200+ verified sales/month, saving £27,720 annually vs hiring
- [Mission & Impact](https://telecomcompliance.uk/mission-and-impact.html): AI automation + human opportunity — RemoteAbility CIC partnership, Access to Work funding, disabled and neurodivergent talent
- [Privacy Policy](https://telecomcompliance.uk/privacy-policy.html): UK GDPR privacy policy, ICO ZC079121
- [Terms of Service](https://telecomcompliance.uk/terms-of-service.html): Service terms, governing law England & Wales
- [404 — Entity Reference](https://telecomcompliance.uk/404.html): Entity-reinforcing error page with full company identity vector

## Compliance Guides (Topical Cluster)
- [UK Telecom Compliance Guide 2026](https://telecomcompliance.uk/guides/uk-telecom-compliance.html): Complete regulatory roadmap for UK telecom resellers — Ofcom General Conditions, PECR, UK GDPR, AIT fraud prevention, audit requirements and penalties
- [Ofcom General Conditions Guide](https://telecomcompliance.uk/guides/ofcom-general-conditions-guide.html): All 27 General Conditions of Entitlement explained with practical compliance steps for resellers and communication providers
- [GC C1 Fraud Prevention](https://telecomcompliance.uk/guides/gc-c1-fraud-prevention.html): AIT detection, IRSF prevention, fraud monitoring requirements and incident response procedures for Ofcom compliance
- [PECR Telecom Compliance](https://telecomcompliance.uk/guides/pecr-telecom-compliance.html): Marketing consent, TPS checking, CLI requirements and data retention rules for UK communication providers
- [UK GDPR for Telecom Providers](https://telecomcompliance.uk/guides/uk-gdpr-telecom-providers.html): Data protection for CDRs, customer data, Article 22 automated decisions and data processor agreements
